fields.headline: Hole-by-hole tale of Woods' round
fields.bodyText: 1st: 4 shots (par 4) Iron finds first cut of rough. Second shot to front of green and long putt leaves a tap-in. 2nd: 4 (4) Wayward iron into rough but on with his second. Two putts. 3rd: 3 (4) Two-iron to fairway and wedge from 120 yards to four feet. Holes birdie putt. 4th: 3 (3) Safely on 25 feet away. Putt veers at the last to leave tap-in. 5th: 4 (5) Driver again misses fairway but into trampled rough. Iron from 230 yards to front edge. Looping putt leaves five-footer for birdie. 6th: 4 (4) Three-wood to fairway and eight-iron to 35 feet. Putts to two feet and sinks the second. 7th: 3 (3) Tee shot into centre of green and two putts from 25 feet. 8th: 4 (4) Finds middle of fairway and hits second from 194 yards to 30 feet. Two putts. 9th: 5 (5) Tee-shot to fairway and three-iron from 242 yards away. Putts five feet past, misses the return then taps in. 10th: 4 (4) Driver misses fairway on left. Chops back on, hits third to 12 feet and holes the putt. 11th: 4 (4) Finds fairway, on in two and takes two putts for par. 12th: 4 (4): Iron to middle of fairway, finds green with second shot and two-putts from 18 feet. 13th: 3 (3) Seven-iron stops 12 feet past. Putts to left edge and taps in. 14th: 4 (Par 4) Long iron to fairway but comes up short from 208 yards. Putts to three feet and sinks second. 15th: 4 (4) Two-iron to fairway. Second from 164 yards to seven feet. Shaves hole and then taps in. 16th: 3 (3) Seven-iron to five feet but lips out and has to tap in for par. 17th: 4 (5) Iron to fairway, second to thick rough short of green. Punches past flag but holes from 12 feet. 18th: 4 (4) Long iron and super second from 219 yards, pin-high and right. Two putts for par. TOTAL SCORE: 68 (par 71)
